ygData.subject: Re: Dawn on a New Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: The wolf bot had barely caught the orders, but understood them. He changed to his grim-looking black wolf mode and followed Hot Rod at a surprising speed.

The wolf bot had barely caught the orders, but understood them. He 
changed to his grim-looking black wolf mode and followed Hot Rod at a 
surprising speed.

Blackfang: Hay Hot Rod (jokingly) do you mind to wait for me next 
time, or are you sooo eager to prove your worth to Talos? Anyhow, do 
you have any information on that pod?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "Got it. I'll get out there, at best speeds."
> 
> Hot Rod made his way out of the base, and transformed to car mode. 
He took off, heading North.
